quote_first: A private wireless telegraph which would transmit by dot and dash system the result of a national equine handicap (flat or steeplechase) of 1 or more miles and furlongs won by an outsider at odds of 50 to 1 at
quote_last: at Ascot (Greenwich time), the message being received and available for betting purposes in Dublin at 2.59 p.m.
title: Ulysses
author: James Joyce
